columns.stuid: The unique identifier of the student participating in activities.
columns.actid: The unique identifier of the activity in which the student participates.

Participates_in.table_description: The table tracks student participation in various activities.

columns.actid: The unique identifier of the activity.
columns.activity_name: The name of the activity offered.

Activity.table_description: The table lists various activities available in the system.

columns.FacID: The unique identifier of the faculty member participating in activities.
columns.actid: The unique identifier of the activity in which the faculty participates.

Faculty_Participates_in.table_description: The table tracks faculty participation in various activities.

columns.StuID: The unique identifier of the student.
columns.LName: The last name of the student.
columns.Fname: The first name of the student.
columns.Age: The age of the student in years.
columns.Sex: The gender of the student, represented by a single character.
columns.Major: The unique identifier of the student's major.
columns.Advisor: The unique identifier of the student's advisor.
columns.city_code: The code representing the student's city of residence.

Student.table_description: The table stores detailed information about each student.

columns.FacID: The unique identifier of the faculty member.
columns.Lname: The last name of the faculty member.
columns.Fname: The first name of the faculty member.
columns.Rank: The academic rank of the faculty member.
columns.Sex: The gender of the faculty member, represented by a single character.
columns.Phone: The contact phone number of the faculty member.
columns.Room: The room number assigned to the faculty member.
columns.Building: The name of the building where the faculty office is located.

Faculty.table_description: The table stores detailed information about each faculty member.
